name: ProfessorBS
0:
”Alexa, open Professor B. S.”
”Alexa, ask Professor B. S.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: professor b. s.
des:
This is the virtual colleague that you've been waiting for.
Whenever you get a question at work that you can't answer, or don't want to answer, just ask Professor B.S. and he will give you a nonsense answer that works for any question.
You are welcome, and you may now go back to your nap!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
